definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out

sentences.english: The doctor asked to be paged if the patient's condition grew  worse suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 如果病人的病情突然恶化，医生让马上用寻呼机叫他。

sentences.english: I have his pager number right here.
The way you feel when you see your name on the pager after you just had a big fight.
sentences.chinese: 大闹一场后，呼机上又有她的信号时你的感受。

sentences.english: All beepers and mobile phones must be during the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 在开会过程中所有的呼机和手机必须关闭。

sentences.english: It was basically just an email pager.
sentences.chinese: 它基本上只是一个邮件呼机。

sentences.english: I found a beeper on my desk. Is that yours?
sentences.chinese: 在我桌上我发现了一个寻呼机。是你的吗？

sentences.english: A sampling of the many cell phones and pagers are part of the exhibit.
sentences.chinese: 此次展览抽取了一部分手机和呼机进行展出。

sentences.english: All the beepers and mobile phones must be kept off during the concert.
sentences.chinese: 在音乐演奏的过程中，所有的呼机和手机必须关掉。

sentences.english: Find a beeper and deposit it on the origin.
sentences.chinese: 找到一个寻呼机和存款它的起源。

sentences.english: It is also very rude to leave a cell phone or beeper on during a movie.
sentences.chinese: 看电影时把手机或者寻呼机开着也是不礼貌的行为。

sentences.english: Please help! There’s a pager number.
sentences.chinese: 之后留了一个寻呼机的号码。

sentences.english: This pager arrangement could also be used by a carer.
sentences.chinese: 本传呼机安排也可以由一个照顾者使用。

sentences.english: And what is more, beepers and mobile phones must be off during the concert.
sentences.chinese: 另外，音乐会期间，传呼机和手机必须关闭。

sentences.english: Please keep off your beepers and mobile phones during the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 会议期间请关上你们的呼机和手机。

sentences.english: The pager is cheap but only handles minimal amounts of information.
sentences.chinese: 传呼机便宜但只能处置少量的信息。

sentences.english: Please close your beepers and mobile phones.
sentences.chinese: 请关闭您的传呼机和手机。

definition: to notify sb of a call/to call sb to the phone
Personal Handy-phone System (PHS), mobile network system operating in China 1998-2013, branded "Little Smart"
cell phone (bulky, early-model one)/brick phone/mob boss
